events.message: Applicant submitted a request for a personal loan to cover upcoming medical expenses and some existing debts.
The loan application was reviewed by the system and categorised under personal loans due to keywords like medical and debt.
An experienced loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to handle the application and follow up with the applicant.
The initial review of the application was conducted focusing on the applicant’s financial standing and loan requirements.
The applicant was asked to submit detailed medical bills, proof of income, and documentation related to any outstanding debts.
Applicant promptly submitted all requested documents including medical receipts and employment verification letters.
Credit check completed revealing a moderate credit score with no recent defaults or late payments.
Risk assessment was performed focusing on the applicant’s credit profile, outstanding debts, and repayment capacity.
A loan offer was presented to the applicant outlining terms including interest rate, repayment schedule, and fees.
Applicant provided feedback accepting the offered loan terms and requested clarification on certain payment options.
Application was escalated to senior underwriting for final approval due to the medical loan amount requested.
The loan application was approved by senior management after thorough review and risk evaluation.
Loan funds were disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to cover medical expenses and outstanding debts.
Follow-up call made to ensure applicant is satisfied with the loan disbursement and to answer any further questions.
The loan application process was formally closed after successful funding and post-approval confirmation.
